name: Death Hall
description:
Be brave and enter the Death Hall, where a monstrous blob will be hot on your heels as you escape its abysmal lair.

PURE PLATFORMING ACTION
Running and jumping is a joy when the controls are great, and Death Hall has great controls! Enjoy super-carefully tuned gameplay that makes every step, every collision and every decision responsive and fun.

** Touch Arcade Game of the Week **
** Pocket Gamer Gold Rating **

SPECIAL ITEMS FOR YOUR JOURNEY
Collect the souls of dead critters to buy useful items from a cloaked merchant...

REACH THE END, DISCOVER THE TRUTH
Will you escape the Death Hall in one piece? If you make it past 3 stages of treachery, you will be rewarded with an intense boss battle and a satisfying, mysterious conclusion.

HASTE SCORE
Interesting score system where you can multiply your final score by running with skill, taking minimal damage, and never slowing down.

INCREDIBLE ANIMATION
Enter the mind of an animator who has gone slightly mad, with beastly creatures and death-traps all lovingly crafted to spell your doom.

PLAY YOUR WAY
* Portrait and Landscape mode.
* Left hand / right hand controls option.
* Gesture controls option.
* MFi controller support.

Music by Gareth Wiecko.
